## DateConstraint interface

Constraint on dates. Used with datepicker to eliminate certain dates ie weekends, holidays, ...

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DateConstraint 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [message](./forms42core.dateconstraint.message.md) |  | string | The error message if picked |

|  --- | --- |
